metadata.title: CVE-2020-25212 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A TOCTOU mismatch in the NFS client code in the Linux kernel before 5.8.3could be used by local attackers to corrupt memory or possibly haveunspecified other impact because a size check is in fs/nfs/nfs4proc.cinstead of fs/nfs/nfs4xdr.c, aka CID-b4487b935452.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-48-generic - 5.4.0-48.52
linux-image-5.4.0-48-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-48.52
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-48-generic - 5.4.0-48.52
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-48-lowlatency - 5.4.0-48.52
No subscription required

No subscription required
